item.description: KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0365; 07:53AM; 721 S Main St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Z4yvHq; #DowntownLA; Firefighters responded to a five-story building with smoke showing from the second floor. Firefighters made entry and located one unit containing fire on the second floor, which had filled the floor with smoke. 48 Firefighters extinguished the flames in 23 minutes and will continue to utilize blowers to systematically remove smoke and reintroduce fresh air into the building. No reported injuries. The cause of the fire is under investigation. LAPD Inc #1075.; FS 9; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; AR1 BC1 BC11 BC5 CM20 CM22 E10 E11 E20 E209 E210 E211 E215 E227 E3 E4 E9 EA1 EM1 EM11 EM13 HR3 RA11 RA3 RA4 RA9 SQ21 T10 T11 T15 T27 T9 UR3 UR88; CH9; 14 15; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#0365; 07:30AM; 721 S Main St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Z4yvHq; #DowntownLA; Five-story building (hotel?) with moderate smoke showing. Offensive mode.; FS 9; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 E10 E210 RA11 SQ21 T10 T9; CH9; 14; Nicholas Prange

Fatality Traffic Collision; INC#1469; 06:54PM; 11950 N Lopez Canyon Rd; MAP: https://bit.ly/3DVayIr; #LakeViewTerrace; PRELIM: Two vehicle collision. No entrapment. Three patients total: one adult (undetermined age/gender) deceased and remains at scene. One elder female in serious condition and one adult male in fair condition, both to area hospitals by LAFD Paramedics. No further details. Media Inquiries: LAPD Valley Traffic Division (Incident #3319) and Coroner.; FS 98; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC12 E298 EM15 RA75 RA898 RA91 T98; CH8; Brian Humphrey

Fatality Vehicle Fire; INC#0753; 11:23AM; 13799 W Jefferson Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3xvIvOn; #PlayaDelRey; PRELIM: LAFD arrived quickly to the scene of a reported vehicle fire to discover a burning motorhome parked on the road shoulder. During fire extinguishment, a lifeless adult male was discovered in the vehicle. Beyond medical help, he was determined deceased and remains at the scene. No other injuries reported. The cause of the fire is under active investigation. Media Inquiries: LAPD Pacific Division (Incident #1670) and Coroner.; FS 67; Batt 4; West Bureau; Council District 11; AR1 BC4 E62 E67 RA5; CH7; Brian Humphrey

Knockdown - Structure Fire; INC#1790; 11:22PM; 9301 W Venice Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Ib1WRi; #Palms; 24 LAFD Firefighters joined by Culver City FD in Automatic Aid, took just 71 minutes in a well-coordinated defensive firefight, to access, confine and fully extinguish heavy fire involving multiple vehicles as well as an adjacent 5,019 square foot one-story automotive body shop that was well involved on their arrival. There was also some minor fire extension to an adjacent building. No injury. Fire cause under investigation.; FS 43; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 5; BC18 EA1 E294 E43 E58 E63 RA43 T94; CH9; 14; Brian Humphrey

Structure Fire; INC#1790; 10:11PM; 9301 W Venice Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Ib1WRi; #Palms; PRELIM: LAFD and Culver City FD (in Automatic Aid) in joint defensive firefighting operations at one story automotive body shop in LAFD jurisdiction.; FS 43; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 5; BC18 E294 E43 E58 RA43 T94 and Culver City FD; CH9; 14; Brian Humphrey

title.a: Knockdown - Greater Alarm Structure Fire 02/17/2023 INC#1430

item.description: Knockdown - Greater Alarm Structure Fire; INC#1430; 07:38PM; 15225 W Stagg St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3YYfsPe; #VanNuys; 130 LAFD Firefighters took just 80 minutes of largely defensive operations to access, confine and fully extinguish heavy fire within a 50' x 100' one-story automotive radiator supply firm. No injury. Traffic Collision; INC#0545; 09:24AM; 19741 W Crystal Hills Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/41e6Eqr; #PorterRanch; PRELIM: Solo vehicle into two story home. No entrapment. No injury. L.A. Dept of Building & Safety en route. No further details.
